positions.description: Main entrance of the Car Dealer, suitable for vehicle or character entry.
Showroom floor, ideal for showcasing vehicles and character interactions.
Sales desk, suitable for dialogue or transaction scenes.
Garage area, ideal for vehicle repairs or technical demonstrations.
Parking lot outside the Car Dealer, suitable for vehicle parking or ambush scenes.

paths.description: A straight path from the main entrance to the showroom floor.
A curved path leading from the showroom floor to the sales desk.
A narrow corridor connecting the showroom floor to the garage area.
A straight path from the garage area to the parking lot.
A curved path from the main entrance to the parking lot.

obstacles.description: A vehicle display stand partially blocking the path to the sales desk.
A tool cart obstructing the corridor to the garage area.
An oil spill creating a slippery hazard on the path to the parking lot.
An abandoned vehicle partially blocking the curved path to the parking lot.
